none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-10-fragmented/extracted/Fragmented/01 The Point Of Breaking Inches Closer

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 26, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Active during the second half of the '90s, Illinois act FRAGMENTED left us with a legacy of incredibly engaging sounds. The Solemn Drain's nearly hour and a half excursion is simultaneously a throwback to primitive first wave noise/electronic purveyors, and a precursor to today's constantly growing world of knob twiddlers...but FRAGMENTED still exist on an island. The sounds are dark, introspective, they draw you in and hold you tight and, in the right mood, I barely notice that the rest of the world fades into the background. This one is important, kids... THE SOLEMN DRAIN
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HKZGOehZ-6Y/WBCynd4zxwI/AAAAAAAAP4M/00eyNU8RW98AMUv091Jv6wQVQuLNF_iUACLcB/s1600/fragmented%2Binside%2Bcopy.jpg
